storyInfo: The townsfolk attempt to hand Jordi over to the Inquisition to save themselves. Thiago helps Jordi escape. Meanwhile, the appearance of the Nethersea Brand has put Carmen, Kal'tsit and the Hunters on alert.

attributes.content: Exactly as the reports say. Such a curious creature.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: (Growls in warning)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Easy now, no need to get excited. Seems you understand human speech.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: There are parasites living on these Sea Terrors, but I've never seen them on land before.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: The Iberians call it the 'Nethersea Brand.'
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: An eerie glow has been occasionally seen off the coast of Iberia since the Profound Silence, the earliest known instance dating back to 17 years ago.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Our scientists believe it to be some sort of algal bloom.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: So, have the Ægir also encountered these... unsettling things?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Seldom, but the Academy's garden has no shortage of luminescent ornamental plants.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: So the Ægir do know what the word 'ornamental' means.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Nethersea brand. An apt name. It is the sea leaving its mark on the land.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: At its heart, its spread is no different from the Sea Terrors we saw at Sal Viento.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Do you mean to say this phenomenon is but another form of their evolution?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: I see the biologists of Iberia are lacking in many ways.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: We've encountered some complications, but this is far from the worst-case scenario.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: The Inquisition has noted an alarming increase in the variety of Sea Terrors.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Most notably at Coastline 3, where after a mere four or five days our enemies were unrecognizable.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: As I said, the ocean encroaches upon the land in its own way.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Now, there's an operator from Rhodes Island I must rescue.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I'll accompany you.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: No, it'll be more expedient for you to work with the Hunters to eliminate the threat as quickly as possible.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I'd assumed Iberia would treat her with more caution.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Indeed she should be, but for now we have a clearer enemy to deal with.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: What will you do, consul of Ægir? Continue to bicker over your country's pride?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Ten minutes. I'll take care of everything and meet up with my Hunters.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Then, we can talk about how to reach that lighthouse.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I'll remain here then. Law has been absent from this chapel for far too long, but thankfully someone has been polishing it.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: It will be the only light in this war. The Iberian Inquisition is here, even if it is I alone.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Hey, what's going on?
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Thiago! Where were you?
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: The Church of the Deep's cultists appeared out of nowhere! And the town's covered in monsters!
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: Oh... and...
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: And what? Why did they attack the town?
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Where's Amaia? Did the monsters harm you?
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: They... they...
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: They didn't harm anyone... they're just fighting... an Inquisitor.
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: No one told the Inquisition! I swear!
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: They showed up not long after we found the carcass in the square. It might've been their work in the first place, now that I think of it.
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: What's going on, Uncle? Oh, good afternoon there.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: You look...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Jordi, come with me.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Uncle?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Quiet.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Th-Thiago, it wasn't us... we couldn't have contacted the Inquisition in such a short time, no matter how fast we were.
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: I know. We need to protect Jordi and explain things.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Maybe someone went to them earlier. A week ago, a month ago, who knows? Rumors of cultists have been spreading for a while now.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: I-It wasn't me! Or my husband!
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: Could it be Juan? Maybe the Inquisition found him?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: You knew Juan was a member of the Church of the Deep? When did you find out?
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: Jordi! Go!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Uh... alright.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Thiago!
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: Oh... he's gone.
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: Never mind him. What about the town?
attributes.name: Alert Townsfolk

attributes.content: I-I don't know. The Inquisitor and the outsiders are fighting the monsters. There's nothing we can do about it.
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: Tsk... the Inquisitor will be coming for us once he's done.
attributes.name: Alert Townsfolk

attributes.content: Surely not... wait, what are you thinking?
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: The best-case scenario would be both sides taking each other out...
attributes.name: Alert Townsfolk

attributes.content: What?! You can't possibly be serious!
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: Think about it. Have we really lost that many people to Sea Terrors? Compared to how much damage the Inquisition has done over the years.
attributes.name: Alert Townsfolk

attributes.content: B-But...
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: When they come for you, can you prove that you're not a cultist?
attributes.name: Alert Townsfolk

attributes.content: What are we supposed to do then?
attributes.name: Indiscreet Townsfolk

attributes.content: If the Inquisitor can really kill that many Sea Terrors, the only way to avoid suspicion would be to hand over someone even more suspicious.
attributes.name: Alert Townsfolk

attributes.content: For example, an Ægir linked to the Church of the Deep.
attributes.name: Alert Townsfolk

attributes.content: Gkh...
attributes.name: Sea Terror

attributes.content: The others have pulled out. But Amaia is nowhere to be seen.
attributes.name: Rear Guard Cultist

attributes.content: Both an Inquisitor, and the Abyssal Hunters. I've only heard them mentioned in passing by Amaia.
attributes.name: Rear Guard Cultist

attributes.content: Here on land, though, they're not as troublesome as the Inquisitor.
attributes.name: Rear Guard Cultist

attributes.content: Find Amaia. Take her, and delay the Abyssal Hunters.
attributes.name: Rear Guard Cultist

attributes.content: Go. Our siblings have fallen. We are the last ones standing. The Inquisition must not be allowed to take any more of our comrades.
attributes.name: Rear Guard Cultist

attributes.content: (Shifts head in agreement)
attributes.name: Sea Terror

attributes.content: Jordi, hurry!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: O-Okay...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: (What's happened to the town... are those Sea Terrors too?)
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: It's the Inquisition.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Maybe a High Inquisitor, seeing how he's come to uproot a Church hideout all by himself.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Sea Terrors and cultists have appeared in Gran Faro. There's no explaining this away.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Take this, lad, and the lamp your father left you. Keep them safe.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: You're not a child anymore, Jordi Fontanarossa. I've told you everything. This is your last chance to embrace a new life.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: I... I always wanted to tell you the truth, convince you to leave, but I...
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: I know, Uncle. You're like a father to me. Gran Faro is our home. If I leave here... I won't have anything left.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: It was going to happen, sooner or later. All the young folks want to leave; you're the exception.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: I'll go with you. Sea Terrors are dangerous, but I know how to deal with them. This is our last chance to slip past the Inquisitors, though.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: What's that sound?
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: ...The door?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Uhh.... Huh?
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: You! Not even Sea Terrors eat people, but you people have no such qualms!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Say something! Pyotr! Manuel! I know it's you out there! Cowards!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: They've blocked the door.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: What? But why?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Because you're an Ægir.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: They must've surrounded the place. We'll go up to the attic and leave through the roof.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Do I... know you?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Look at you, Laurentina... What happened to your nun's habit? You looked so good in it.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Ah, you found where you belonged, right? The Abyssal Hunters found you, and they want to bring you home?
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Laurentina... my name is Laurentina.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The name of the vast creation's master.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: What is this 'vast creation's master?'
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The ocean, or its avatar.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Something's not right with your state of mind... You shouldn't be so— Oh, were you awake? When you killed Quintus, for instance?
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Quin...tus?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You touched the sea, but did not immediately proceed to Ægir? I thought you people longed for home.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Or do you have somebody on land, gently guiding you?
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Why did we have to reunite under such circumstances, Laurentina?
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Your hands, are so cold.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: There was a time when there were no secrets between us.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Now, though...
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Specter!
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: When you remember my name, come and find me. If you still remember this conversation, that is.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: If your mind is your own then, I will tell you the whole truth.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Farewell, Laurentina.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Who was that?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I don't know... but she seems to know me?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: She has no scent. She's not Seaborn, at least not like Quintus.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: We don't have time for her.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Clean up the Sea Terrors, and we'll regroup with the Captain.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Hey, there aren't any Sea Terrors around here, are there?
attributes.name: Blockading Townsfolk

attributes.content: Only dead ones. It's so quiet here... Did the Inquisition take care of them all?
attributes.name: Helping Townsfolk

attributes.content: All the better. Come, help me shut them inside. Somebody go fetch the Inquisitor!
attributes.name: Blockading Townsfolk

attributes.content: A-Alright, it's blocked. But why are we doing this to Mayor Thiago when everything's such a mess right now?
attributes.name: Helping Townsfolk

attributes.content: Because we're all off to the gallows when things STOP being a mess, unless we do something about it. Go check out the chapel and get someone from the Inquisition.
attributes.name: Blockading Townsfolk

attributes.content: Me? But what if there are still monsters...?
attributes.name: Helping Townsfolk

attributes.content: Huh? Is there someone on the roof?
attributes.name: Helping Townsfolk

attributes.content: Wha—?
attributes.name: Blockading Townsfolk

attributes.content: It's Jordi and Thiago! Get them! Don't let them get away!
attributes.name: Blockading Townsfolk

attributes.content: Run!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: I, I know!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Get out of town, and don't let the Inquisitors or those bastards catch you!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Alright!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: *pant* Keep running north... *pant*... There's a messenger station there that might still be in operation...
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Alright!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: I put some money in your bag... *pant*... get out of town, get out of the country!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: A-Alright!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Jordi!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: I'm listening!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Thiago's footsteps slow down.
He looks on as the young Ægir runs desperately down the street.
Run! Don't look back! Keep running!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: That's right... get out of here... never look back.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Don't let them out of town!
attributes.name: Pursuer

attributes.content: You were right, lad.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: This is our home, and no amount of waiting or complaining will change that.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: (Ægirian) Farewell, my child!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Thiago! Where's the Ægir!
attributes.name: Pursuing Townsfolk

attributes.content: Coward!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: W-What the hell are you doing? You'll doom us all! We'll all be branded heretics by the Inquisition, just like the old days!
attributes.name: Pursuing Townsfolk

attributes.content: Are you more afraid of the Inquisition than the Sea Terrors? More afraid of your own people than monsters?
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: We already lost everything to the Inquisition once. Do you want that to happen again?
attributes.name: Pursuing Townsfolk

attributes.content: Pah... your fist is like rubber...
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: You—wait, what's that... they're still here?!
attributes.name: Pursuing Townsfolk

attributes.content: (Ominous slithering sounds)
attributes.name: Sea Terror

attributes.content: I, I've got to get back to the chapel. The Inquisitors will protect me—
attributes.name: Pursuing Townsfolk

attributes.content: Take that, you coward!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Are, are you mad?! Don't you see the Sea Terrors?
attributes.name: Pursuing Townsfolk

attributes.content: What about the Sea Terrors?!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Did Sea Terrors eat Gran Faro? No, it was you people... you're worse than the Profound Silence.
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: You've slaughtered compassion with selfishness, whitewashed your own cowardice, and blamed the disaster on the Ægir!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: No, the monsters, they're getting closer—screw it, nutjob, I don't have time for this!
attributes.name: Pursuing Townsfolk

attributes.content: Of course, you coward. When they took Marin, when they took the Ægir, you were right there under the banner of the Penal Battalion!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Murderer!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Don't think the rest of us are gonna humor you just because you fell in love with an Ægir way back when!
attributes.name: Pursuing Townsfolk

attributes.content: Come at me, coward! You'll get it from me!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: (Sharp sound of breathing)
attributes.name: Sea Terror

attributes.text: The two men become increasingly bloodied as they pummel each other, while Sea Terrors rush by, ignoring them entirely.
They look decidedly out of place.

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Thiago...? Uncle Thiago?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Uncle—?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: *pant* Why...?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: I... I have to go back...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: (Ægirian) Stop right there, Ægir.
Uh, y-yes!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: The last Ægir of Gran Faro. The last descendant of Breogan.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Breo... what?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: The Sea Terrors would kill you, and the Inquisition would imprison you. Come with me. I need you.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: A-Are you one of them? The ones commanding the monsters?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: No! I seek a lost legend, one that caught the attention of even the Academy.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Yet his most important legacy is neither a lighthouse nor a ship, but his descendant.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: You might be the final clue I'm seeking.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I... don't know what you're talking about.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: That man, Thiago, is not your father. Who were your parents? Your grandparents?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: My parents...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: They... they went missing... in search of the Eye of Iberia.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: As cruel as it is, your misfortune is what gives you the chance to become the salvation of Ægir.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Come with me. I'd prefer not to use force against kin.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I... This is all coming out of nowhere.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Come with me.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: What?! What's going on?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Quiet, bro. I'm saving your life.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: A smoke bomb... I shouldn't have let you get away.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: What's the point of running away with him? You know nothing, Liberi.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: You're right, Ægir. There are many mysteries here.
Transgressor, you will answer my questions, or you will never leave this place.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: I hope you're smart enough to recognize this fact.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: Good, looks like we've shaken him off. It was the right choice to grab you when the Inquisitor drew near. They aren't fighting right now, are they?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Hello?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Oh, er, sorry... I need to go back to town.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Wouldn't recommend it. Most of the Sea Terrors are gone, but something doesn't feel right. And I can't get in touch with Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Plus... you were planning to leave, weren't you?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I heard that the Inquisitors came to town, and Uncle Thiago was worried I'd be taken away...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: The Inquisition, huh...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: What did that guy want with you, anyway?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Sorry, you don't have to talk if you don't want to.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I'll need a bit of time to decide whether to go back to town and find Dr. Kal'tsit, or get you out of here first.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I'll go with you.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: You sure? Your uncle was so desperate to get you out.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: If the Inquisition is coming, I doubt I'll be able to escape.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Is that duty worth giving up your life for?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Huh? What do you—?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: So you're going back to Gran Faro just out of some vague sense of duty, without even a clear goal?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You've gotta be kidding me. If I were you, I'd leave this place, along with any townsfolk who don't want to get involved. And soon.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: This isn't like running into a swarm of Originium Slugs while camping out in the woods. I hate to say it, but ordinary people can't do a thing here.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I just feel like there has to be something left for me to do.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: I grew up here, listening to those legends, gazing at the coastline, reading my parents' notes... I don't want my farewell to be like this.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: This place is my home.
attributes.name: Jordi
